wisdom.sentence: American by birth; Texan by the grace of God.

wisdom.sentence: An American is a man with two arms and four wheels.

wisdom.sentence: Anything anybody can say about America is true.

wisdom.sentence: If all the Chinese simultaneously jumped into the Pacific off a 10 foot platform erected 10 feet off their coast, it would cause a tidal wave that would destroy everything in this country west of Nebraska.

wisdom.sentence: In California they don't throw their garbage away -- they make it into television shows.
